name: Suspicious Download from Office Domain
description: Detects suspicious ways to download files from Microsoft domains that are used to store attachments in Emails or OneNote documents
false_positives: Scripts or tools that download attachments from these domains (OneNote, Outlook 365)
query: ((process.executable:(/.*\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Gg][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR process.command_line:(/.*[Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Kk][Ee]\-[Ww][Ee][Bb][Rr][Ee][Qq][Uu][Ee][Ss][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Ww][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*[Cc][Uu][Rr][Ll]\ .*/ OR /.*[Ww][Gg][Ee][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt]\-[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\(.*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ss][Tt][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\(.*/)) AND process.command_line:(/.*[Hh][Tt][Tt][Pp][Ss]\:\/\/[Aa][Tt][Tt][Aa][Cc][Hh][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\.[Ll][Ii][Vv][Ee]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]\/[Oo][Ww][Aa]\/.*/ OR /.*[Hh][Tt][Tt][Pp][Ss]\:\/\/[Oo][Nn][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Oo][Nn][Ll][Ii][Nn][Ee][Ss][Yy][Nn][Cc]\.[Oo][Nn][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]\/[Oo][Nn][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Oo][Nn][Ll][Ii][Nn][Ee][Ss][Yy][Nn][Cc]\/.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:(*\\curl.exe OR *\\wget.exe) OR process.command_line:(*Invoke\-WebRequest* OR *iwr\ * OR *curl\ * OR *wget\ * OR *Start\-BitsTransfer* OR *.DownloadFile\(* OR *.DownloadString\(*)) AND process.command_line:(*https\:\/\/attachment.outlook.live.net\/owa\/* OR *https\:\/\/onenoteonlinesync.onenote.com\/onenoteonlinesync\/*))`
